item.title: Signing Git Commits and Tags Using Your GPG Key
item.description: I have removed the section on configuring git to auto-sign tags, since the configuration doesn’t work. Thanks Hannes Van De Vreken for pointing that out! Signing Git commits using GPG isn’t a requirement in most projects. It is however a nice to have feature, especially in cases where it is important for you to have your identity as the commiter verified. This prevents, for instance, an impersonator from going undetected when they submit a commit as you.
